1513130.name: No Lights
1513130.description:
Master Studios' first game, is a game more focused on JumpScares

With the Objective to Survive, No Lights will take you to a different experience.


The objective of this game is to scare you, you will not wait, you will run ... A Guard against five demons.

No Lights is a survival game that puts you in the place of a security guard.

With cameras and few resources, you will be scared little by little.

Just a linear story, if you want to know more, you’ll have to go deeper

===============

This game is not recommended for people with heart problems or pregnant women

The experience does not have a save system due to the game time (1 hour), but it has much more content than that.
1513130.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
